title: spec: disallow field and method with same name
body:
Related to issue #2828.

The spec allows a struct to have a field and method of the same name.
This led to the protocol buffer generating unusable output.
6g crashes in about half the situations covered by this.

Should the spec disallow a struct field and method of the same name?
I thought it did already.

The must in 'Go1-Must' is "this must be decided" not necessarily
this must be decided a certain way.
